jobDescription: Data Analyst to support program operations and quality improvement in a healthcare organization that integrates care for substance use disorders, mental health, and chronic physical health conditions. Analyze and report data extracted from EHR and other sources, perform statistical analysis, and assist in interpreting and writing up the results. Bachelors Degree with statistics coursework. Excellent written and oral communication skills.  Bachelors Degree with statistics coursework.  Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
